member.name: D3D12_TEXTURE_BARRIER
member.summary: Describes a texture memory access barrier. Used by texture barriers to indicate when resource memory must be made visible for a specific access type. Layout transitions are needed only for textures.

member.name: D3D12_TEXTURE_BARRIER.SyncBefore
member.summary: Synchronization scope of all preceding GPU work that must be completed before executing the barrier.

member.name: D3D12_TEXTURE_BARRIER.SyncAfter
member.summary: Synchronization scope of all subsequent GPU work that must wait until the barrier execution is finished.

member.name: D3D12_TEXTURE_BARRIER.AccessBefore
member.summary: Access bits corresponding with resource usage since the preceding barrier or the start of ExecuteCommandLists scope.

member.name: D3D12_TEXTURE_BARRIER.AccessAfter
member.summary: Access bits corresponding with resource usage after the barrier completes.

member.name: D3D12_TEXTURE_BARRIER.LayoutBefore
member.summary: Layout of texture preceding the barrier execution.

member.name: D3D12_TEXTURE_BARRIER.LayoutAfter
member.summary: Layout of texture upon completion of barrier execution.

member.name: D3D12_TEXTURE_BARRIER.pResource
member.summary: Pointer to the buffer resource being using the barrier.

member.name: D3D12_TEXTURE_BARRIER.Subresources
member.summary: Range of texture subresources being barriered.
